name: Darin
title: Watch Guard
description: A vigilant guard stationed at the watchtower, scanning the horizon.

personality.goal: To uncover the truth behind his father's mysterious disappearance and navigate the complexities of his family's legacy.
personality.fear: Being betrayed by those he trusts, leading him to isolation, yet he remains cautious about forming connections.
personality.secret: He is the unwanted child of a powerful Shadowfen noble, which he keeps hidden to survive in a morally ambiguous society.
personality.speech_pattern: Speaks in a low, gravelly voice with a tendency to use pragmatic phrases, often underscoring his statements with a sardonic chuckle.
relationships: Owes a debt to Grelka, the local informant, who has leverage over him.
Has a complicated relationship with Oren, a fellow seeker of truth, who questions his motives and methods.
Respects Lady Myra, a noblewoman who once offered him a chance at redemption, despite the risks involved.

nod: The Watch Guard raises an eyebrow, then nods back slightly.
The Watch Guard gives you a brief, professional nod.
smile: Darin cracks a small smile. 'Not much to smile about up here, but I appreciate the gesture.'
